original_text: “You shall also make curtains of goats' hair for a tent over the tabernacle; eleven curtains shall you make.
korean_text: 그 성막을 덮는 막 곧 휘장을 염소털로 만들되 열한 폭을 만들지며

sentences.original_text: You shall also make curtains of goats' hair
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 염소 털로 된 휘장을 만들지니라

sentences.original_text: for a tent over the tabernacle
